alert.note: Alert for Cleburne; Conway; Faulkner; Lonoke; Perry; Pulaski; White (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 14 at 10:43PM CDT until July 14 at 11:30PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Perry County in central Arkansas... Southern Cleburne County in north central Arkansas... Northwestern Lonoke County in central Arkansas... Southeastern Conway County in central Arkansas... Faulkner County in central Arkansas... Southwestern White County in central Arkansas... Northern Pulaski County in central Arkansas... * Until 1130 PM CDT. * At 1042 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Quitman to near Greenbrier to St. Vincent, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Conway... Sherwood... Jacksonville... Cabot... Searcy... Heber Springs... Morrilton... Little Rock AFB... Beebe... Greenbrier... Ward... Vilonia... Mayflower... Austin in Lonoke County... Judsonia... Kensett... Wooster... Oppelo... Quitman... Higginson... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Cleburne; Conway; Faulkner; Lonoke; Perry; Pulaski; White
